content.description: Climb in the crack using the obvious side of the Boulder to pull against. You can scoot your back against the side to help in getting up but this would make it around a V1. If you come onto the face after climbing the crack, I believe this gives it more of a V2. Is around 15-20 feet high at the top. The face has some nice ripples for feet and hands. And can walk out from the top.
content.protection: Get a nice spotter below you in the crack
content.location: Right directly to the left when looking at the wall from the parking lot circle.

content.description: Several sport and trad routes as well as bouldering. Sport routes are bolted with old star drives if I remember correctly. Tread lightly and climb at your own risk.
